alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 1:50PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland, northwestern Ashland and southeastern Crawford Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 150 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crestline, or 11 miles west of Mansfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Galion, Shelby, Ontario, Crestline, Bailey Lakes, North Robinson, Mifflin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
